name: Rich in Space
description:
A little but intense game made for Ludum Dare #40 with the theme: 'the more you have the worse it is'. It's set in space where you have to mine asteroids to earn money. However, as you get more money there will be pirates trying to destroy your base and steal your money, the more money you have made the more pirates that want it. Try and make as much money as you can before you get destroyed.

Controls:

  • Pan Camera: WASD / Arrow Keys.
  • Build / Sell: Left Mouse Button.
  • Cancel (Build / Sell): Right Mouse Button.
